boone.map

Class Function.Clip

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.map.Function
      • boone.map.Function.Clip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    Function

    public static class Function.Clip
extends Function
    Clip: return value if value in the given range, else the low/high range border value. Defaults: lowBorder = 0.0, highBorder = 1.0
